name: Animal Song
description:
A game inspired by and based on a song written by the Lyra Project Podcast group earlier in the year, all about animals! 

We were about to perform their song as part of a spring concert, then lockdown hit - so I wanted to archive and celebrate their work in another way.

Talk to each animal to find what they're looking for, and help make their day!

Use the keyboard arrows to move around, talk to animals, and collect items.
